attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People, gay or not, black or white, Muslim or Christian, do not have an automatic right to any product in a shop or any service from a company - we have no rights to their private property or service, consumer laws don't require them to accept our money and request for their products.

The Trading Standards website says this, on the consumers right to a product or service,
"Goods on display in a shop are there for you to make an offer to buy, the shop is not obliged to accept your offer."

Our government has ignored an important right in any capitalistic democracy, the rights of private property owners to not give away property, the right to keep property private.

We can not remove racism or homophobia from our society by changing laws, we must change minds ... discriminating against the majority will make more racists and homophobes that it will silence.

Thought should not be dictated by the government and minorities should not rights that others don't have.
